equipmentSlots.name: Elite tectonic mask
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Tectonic Mask - Virtus Mask - Anima core helm of Seren (Cryptbloom should only be used if basing)
equipmentSlots.label: etectohelm

equipmentSlots.name: Igneous Kal-Zuk
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: A normal Igneous Kal-Mej can be used if the combination cape is not unlocked yet
equipmentSlots.label: kalzuk

equipmentSlots.name: Essence of Finality amulet (green)
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Guthix staff spec (Abs shouldnt be used at aod)
Was only used for kills higher than 2min before fsoa rework, not anymore
equipmentSlots.label: eofgreenunorn

equipmentSlots.name: Wand of the praesul
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Seismic wand - Wand of the Cywir elders
equipmentSlots.label: pwand

equipmentSlots.name: Elite tectonic robe top
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Tectonic Robe Top - Virtus Robe Top - Anima core body of Seren (Cryptbloom should only be used if basing)
equipmentSlots.label: etectotop

equipmentSlots.name: Ancient lantern
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Can be swapped with a regular t90 shield although a defender is a better choice
equipmentSlots.label: lantern

equipmentSlots.name: Elite tectonic robe bottom
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Tectonic Robe Bottom - Virtus Robe Bottom - Anima core legs of Seren (Cryptbloom should only be used if basing)
equipmentSlots.label: etectolegs

equipmentSlots.name: Deathtouched bracelet
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Can be swapped for Kerapac's wrist wraps
equipmentSlots.label: dtb

equipmentSlots.name: Blast diffusion boots
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Shouldnt be downgraded as they are very cheap
equipmentSlots.label: diffusion

equipmentSlots.name: Reaver's ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Bis ring, can be swapped with channeler's ring (Usually a better choice for base)
equipmentSlots.label: reaverring

equipmentSlots.name: Grasping rune pouch (blue)
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Body | Soul | Blood | Astral (Can fill however you want)
equipmentSlots.label: graspingpouchblue

equipmentSlots.name: Maniacal aura
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Zerk auras are the only option for AoD since the high defence of the boss
equipmentSlots.label: mani

equipmentSlots.name: Erethdor's grimoire
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Ful book - Jas book - Wen Book - Scrimshaw of the elements (Superior)
equipmentSlots.label: grim

inventorySlots.name: Fractured Staff of Armadyl
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Strongly recommended to have (If no fsoa, camping duals would be a better choice)
inventorySlots.label: fsoa

inventorySlots.name: Inquisitor staff
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Strong addition for more damage, a good option for 2h if no fsoa
inventorySlots.label: inq

inventorySlots.name: Imperium core
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Seismic singularity - Orb of the Cywir elders
inventorySlots.label: core

inventorySlots.name: Flanking perk
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Optional but strongly suggested for more damage
inventorySlots.label: flank

inventorySlots.name: Luck of the dwarves
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Switch before the end of the kill for t4 luck
inventorySlots.label: lotd

inventorySlots.name: Combat dummy MKII
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Optional for more complex mechanics (Losing target for a 15% detonate) (Not optional for the free mage role since they are required to place the stalling dummy at south)
inventorySlots.label: dummy

inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Water | Fire | Air | Chaos (Can fill however you want)
inventorySlots.label: graspingpouch

inventorySlots.name: Guthix rest
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Core food (Good to clear poison from pillar if you dont have elder salve overloads and doesnt drain stats like saradomin brew) - Saradomin brew is a strong choice while learning
inventorySlots.label: grest

inventorySlots.name: Adrenaline renewal flask (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Can be a 4(or 2) dose, will only be used twice in slow teams (+2:00 min) and once in faster teams (-1:50 min)
inventorySlots.label: renewal6

inventorySlots.name: Powerburst of acceleration (4)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
Used to move around pillars in faster teams
Used to get out of ice mechanic
inventorySlots.label: accel4
